title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
ove it - or else.

Choosing dialogue 1 will reveal that that a Netherese parasite is a tampered parasite, that being the reason why you have not turned into a mindflayer yet. This will give you the same dialogue options but adding one more.

What do you mean. 'tampered'? I thought you could remove it? All the more reason to remove it - or else.

Choosing dialogue 1 will have Auntie Ethel explain that your parasite has been touched by more than just mindflayers and chooses not to help you anymore
